reviewText: Really informative for sunday school teaching

I enjoyed this series so much when it aired on the History Channel that I wanted to get as many of the episodes as possible. But check before purchase because a lot of them are included in other sets. This was included in another set that I purchased at the same time, but since my son also enjoys this series, I will be passing the duplicates to him.

I was always a big fan when Mysteries of the Bible used to air weekly on A&E.  I was saddened when it no longer was available on A&E.  I am very thankful they have provided this series on DVD.  I am enjoying this DVD series very much.  I always enjoyed the narration by Richard Kiley and Jean Simmons.  Very well done.
